item.title: Every Glinda Outfit Ariana Grande Wears In Wicked, Ranked
item.description: Ariana Grande's Glinda wears many stunning outfits throughout the worldwide hit Wicked, each as glittering and complex as the last.

item.title: Taika Waititi's Best Akira Promise Is That It'll Be Nothing Like The 1988 Anime Movie
item.description: If Taika Waititi's live-action Akira film ever actually happens, the fact it'll be nothing like the original anime movie makes it way more exciting.
